title: kaa guha
sahitya:
kA guhA SaNmukhA nIyE gati idEdadi



anupallavi



Agu vAhana sOdara deivAnai vaLLi manOhara manOhara manOhara



caraNam



shAlavE pAncAla kOsalAdi nADngum nIDavE nin shIlam  sholiyE innum pala
shentamizh i ai pADavE
kAlan aNugAmalE kaliyAl naliyAmalE ekkAlum kavi kunjaradAsanai kaNNin imai pOlE
